+    let dotPos = { x: mouse.x, y: mouse.y };
+
+    // ç›‘å¬é¼ æ ‡ç§»åŠ¨
+    const handleMouseMove = (e) => {
+      mouse.x = e.clientX;
+      mouse.y = e.clientY;
+    };
+    document.addEventListener('mousemove', handleMouseMove);
+
+    // ç›‘å¬é¼ æ ‡æ‚¬åœåœ¨å¯ç‚¹å‡»å¯¹è±¡ä¸Šçš„äº‹ä»¶
+    const handleMouseEnter = () => {
+      dot.classList.add('cursor-dot-hover'); // æ·»åŠ æ”¾å¤§æ ·å¼
+    };
+    const handleMouseLeave = () => {
+      dot.classList.remove('cursor-dot-hover'); // ç§»é™¤æ”¾å¤§æ ·å¼
+    };
+
+
+    // ä¸ºæ‰€æœ‰å¯ç‚¹å‡»å…ƒç´ å’ŒåŒ…å« hover æˆ– group-hover ç±»åçš„å…ƒç´ æ·»åŠ äº‹ä»¶ç›‘å¬
+    setTimeout(() => {
+      const clickableElements = document.querySelectorAll(
+        'a, button, [role="button"], [onclick], [cursor="pointer"], [class*="hover"], [class*="group-hover"], [class*="cursor-pointer"]'
+      );
+      clickableElements.forEach((el) => {
+        el.addEventListener('mouseenter', handleMouseEnter);
+        el.addEventListener('mouseleave', handleMouseLeave);
+      });
+    }, 200); // å»¶æ—¶ 200ms æ‰§è¡Œ
+
+    // åŠ¨ç”»å¾ªç¯ï¼šå»¶è¿Ÿæ›´æ–°å°ç™½ç‚¹ä½ç½®
+    const updateDotPosition = () => {
+      const damping = 0.2; // é˜»å°¼ç³»æ•°ï¼Œå€¼è¶Šå°å»¶è¿Ÿè¶Šæ˜æ˜¾
+      dotPos.x += (mouse.x - dotPos.x) * damping;
+      dotPos.y += (mouse.y - dotPos.y) * damping;
+
+      // æ›´æ–°DOM
+      dot.style.left = `${dotPos.x}px`;
+      dot.style.top = `${dotPos.y}px`;
+
+      requestAnimationFrame(updateDotPosition);
+    };
+
+    // å¯åŠ¨åŠ¨ç”»
+    updateDotPosition();
+
+    // æ¸…ç†å‡½æ•°
+    return () => {
+      document.removeEventListener('mousemove', handleMouseMove);
+      const clickableElements = document.querySelectorAll(
+        'a, button, [role="button"], [onclick], [cursor="pointer"], [class*="hover"], [class*="group-hover"], [class*="cursor-pointer"]'
+      );
+      clickableElements.forEach((el) => {
+        el.removeEventListener('mouseenter', handleMouseEnter);
+        el.removeEventListener('mouseleave', handleMouseLeave);
+      });
+      document.body.removeChild(dot);
+    };
+  }, [router]);
+
+  return (
+    <style jsx global>{`

+    position: fixed;
+    width: 12px;
+    height: 12px;
+    background: white;
+    border-radius: 50%;
+    pointer-events: none;
+    transform: translate(-50%, -50%);

 // å®šä¹‰Notionå—çš„æ¥å£
 interface NotionBlock {
-  object: string
-  type: string
-  [key: string]: unknown

 // å‘é€ Notion API è¯·æ±‚
 async function postNotion(
-  properties: Record<string, unknown>,
-  databaseId: string,
-  listContentMain: ContentItem[],
-  token: string

-
-  const children = listContentMain
-    .map((contentMain: ContentItem): NotionBlock | null => {
-      if (contentMain.type === 'paragraph') {
-        return {
-          object: 'block',
-          type: 'paragraph',
-          paragraph: {
-            rich_text: [
-              { type: 'text', text: { content: contentMain.content } }
-            ]
-          }
-        }
-      } else if (['file', 'image'].includes(contentMain.type)) {

-            type: 'external',

-          }
+properties: Record<string, unknown>,
+databaseId: string,
+listContentMain: ContentItem[],
+token: string)
+: Promise<{status: number;data: Record<string, unknown>;}> {
+  const url = 'https://api.notion.com/v1/pages';
+
+  const children = listContentMain.
+  map((contentMain: ContentItem): NotionBlock | null => {
+    if (contentMain.type === 'paragraph') {
+      return {
+        object: 'block',
+        type: 'paragraph',
+        paragraph: {
+          rich_text: [
+          { type: 'text', text: { content: contentMain.content } }]
+
+        }
+      };
+    } else if (['file', 'image'].includes(contentMain.type)) {
+      return {
+        object: 'block',
+        type: contentMain.type,

 import { decryptEmail } from '@/lib/plugins/mailEncrypt'
 
 /**
- * ç”ŸæˆRSSå†…å®¹
+ * ä¸ãˆã‚‰ã‚ŒãŸå€¤ã‹ã‚‰å®‰å…¨ã« Date ã‚ªãƒ–ã‚¸ã‚§ã‚¯ãƒˆã‚’ç”Ÿæˆã™ã‚‹
+ * - æ–‡å­—åˆ— / æ•°å€¤ / undefined ãªã©ã‚’è¨±å®¹ã—ã€ç„¡åŠ¹ãªå ´åˆã¯ null ã‚’è¿”ã™
+ * @param {*} value
+ * @returns {Date|null}
+ */
+function safeParseDate(value) {
+  if (!value) return null
+
+  // ã™ã§ã« Date ã®å ´åˆ
+  if (value instanceof Date) {
+    return isNaN(value.getTime()) ? null : value
+  }
+
+  // æ•°å€¤ï¼ˆã‚¿ã‚¤ãƒ ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒ³ãƒ—ï¼‰ã®å ´åˆ
+  if (typeof value === 'number') {
+    const d = new Date(value)
+    return isNaN(d.getTime()) ? null : d
+  }
+
+  // æ–‡å­—åˆ—ã®å ´åˆï¼ˆ"YYYY-MM-DD" / ISO æ–‡å­—åˆ— ãªã©ï¼‰
+  if (typeof value === 'string') {
+    // ã¾ãšã¯ãã®ã¾ã¾ãƒ‘ãƒ¼ã‚¹
+    let d = new Date(value)
+    if (!isNaN(d.getTime())) return d
+
+    // "YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ss" ã®ã‚ˆã†ãªæ–‡å­—åˆ—ã‹ã‚‰æ—¥ä»˜éƒ¨åˆ†ã ã‘æŠœãå‡ºã™ä¿é™º
+    const m = value.match(/\d{4}-\d{2}-\d{2}/)
+    if (m) {
+      d = new Date(m[0])
+      if (!isNaN(d.getTime())) return d
+    }
+  }
+
+  return null
+}
+
+/**
+ * æŠ•ç¨¿ã‚ªãƒ–ã‚¸ã‚§ã‚¯ãƒˆã‹ã‚‰ RSS ç”¨ã®æ—¥ä»˜ã‚’å®‰å…¨ã«å–å¾—ã™ã‚‹
+ * å„ªå…ˆé †:
+ *   1. post.publishDay
+ *   2. post.publishDate
+ *   3. post.date.start_date
+ * ã„ãšã‚Œã‚‚ãƒ€ãƒ¡ãªå ´åˆã¯ã€ãƒ“ãƒ«ãƒ‰ãŒè½ã¡ãªã„ã‚ˆã†ã«ã€Œç¾åœ¨æ™‚åˆ»ã€ã‚’è¿”ã™
+ * @param {*} post
+ * @returns {Date}
+ */
+function getPostDateForFeed(post) {
+  const candidates = [
+    post?.publishDay,
+    post?.publishDate,
+    post?.date?.start_date,
+    post?.date
+  ]
+
+  for (const c of candidates) {
+    const d = safeParseDate(c)
+    if (d) return d
+  }
+
+  // ã©ã†ã—ã¦ã‚‚æ­£ã—ã„æ—¥ä»˜ãŒå–ã‚Œãªã„å ´åˆã¯ç¾åœ¨æ™‚åˆ»ã§ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ¼ãƒ«ãƒãƒƒã‚¯
+  return new Date()
+}
+
+/**
+ * RSS ç”¨ã® HTML ã‚³ãƒ³ãƒ†ãƒ³ãƒ„ç”Ÿæˆ
  * @param {*} post
  * @returns
  */
 const createFeedContent = async post => {
-  // åŠ å¯†çš„æ–‡ç« å†…å®¹åªè¿”å›æ‘˜è¦
+  // ãƒ‘ã‚¹ãƒ¯ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ä»˜ãè¨˜äº‹ã¯æ¦‚è¦ã ã‘
   if (post.password && post.password !== '') {
     return post.summary
   }
+
   const blockMap = await getPostBlocks(post.id, 'rss-content')
   if (blockMap) {
     post.blockMap = blockMap
     const content = ReactDOMServer.renderToString(<NotionPage post={post} />)
+
+    // ã‚³ãƒ¬ã‚¯ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³ãƒ“ãƒ¥ãƒ¼(ä¸€è¦§ãƒ†ãƒ¼ãƒ–ãƒ«)ã ã‘ã‚’å‰Šé™¤ã™ã‚‹æ­£è¦è¡¨ç¾
     const regexExp =
       /<div class="notion-collection-row"><div class="notion-collection-row-body"><div class="notion-collection-row-property"><div class="notion-collection-column-title"><svg.*?class="notion-collection-column-title-icon">.*?<\/svg><div class="notion-collection-column-title-body">.*?<\/div><\/div><div class="notion-collection-row-value">.*?<\/div><\/div><\/div><\/div>/g
+
     return content.replace(regexExp, '')
   }
 }

diff -ruN original/scripts/fix-bool-identifiers.js fork/scripts/fix-bool-identifiers.js
--- original/scripts/fix-bool-identifiers.js	1970-01-01 00:00:00.000000000 +0000
+++ fork/scripts/fix-bool-identifiers.js	2025-11-22 03:44:20.000000000 +0000
@@ -0,0 +1,113 @@
+// scripts/fix-bool-identifiers.js
+// èª¤ã£ã¦æŒ¿å…¥ã•ã‚ŒãŸ False / True ã‚’ä¸€æ‹¬ä¿®æ­£ã™ã‚‹ã‚¹ã‚¯ãƒªãƒ—ãƒˆ
+//
+// å¯¾è±¡: components, pages, themes, lib é…ä¸‹ã® .js/.jsx/.ts/.tsx
+// ã‚„ã£ã¦ã„ã‚‹ã“ã¨:
+//  - ã‚³ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ä¸­ã®è­˜åˆ¥å­ã¨ã—ã¦ã® "False" ã‚’ "false" ã«
+//  - è­˜åˆ¥å­ã¨ã—ã¦ã® "True" ã‚’ "true" ã«
+//
+// æ–‡å­—åˆ—ãƒªãƒ†ãƒ©ãƒ«ï¼ˆ"False" ã‚„ 'False'ï¼‰ã¯å‡ºæ¥ã‚‹ã ã‘è§¦ã‚‰ãªã„ã‚ˆã†ã€é›‘ã§ã™ãŒç°¡å˜ãªåˆ¤å®šã‚’å…¥ã‚Œã¦ã„ã¾ã™ã€‚
+
+const fs = require("fs");
+const path = require("path");
+const glob = require("glob");
+
+const GLOBS = [
+  "components/**/*.{js,jsx,ts,tsx}",
+  "pages/**/*.{js,jsx,ts,tsx}",
+  "themes/**/*.{js,jsx,ts,tsx}",
+  "lib/**/*.{js,jsx,ts,tsx}",
+];
+
+function fixContent(code) {
+  // ã‹ãªã‚Šå˜ç´”ãªãƒˆãƒ¼ã‚¯ãƒŠã‚¤ã‚¶ï¼šãƒ€ãƒ–ãƒ«/ã‚·ãƒ³ã‚°ãƒ«/ãƒãƒƒã‚¯ã‚¯ã‚©ãƒ¼ãƒˆã§å›²ã¾ã‚ŒãŸéƒ¨åˆ†ã¯ã‚¹ã‚­ãƒƒãƒ—ã—ã€
+  // ãã‚Œä»¥å¤–ã§å˜èªã¨ã—ã¦ç¾ã‚Œã‚‹ False / True ã‚’ç½®æ›ã—ã¾ã™ã€‚
+  let result = "";
+  let i = 0;
+  const len = code.length;
+  let inString = false;
+  let stringChar = null;
+  let escape = false;
+
+  while (i < len) {
+    const ch = code[i];
+
+    if (inString) {
+      result += ch;
+
+      if (escape) {
+        escape = false;
+      } else if (ch === "\\") {
+        escape = true;
+      } else if (ch === stringChar) {
+        inString = false;
+        stringChar = null;
+      }
+
+      i++;
+      continue;
+    }
+
+    // æ–‡å­—åˆ—ã®é–‹å§‹
+    if (ch === "'" || ch === '"' || ch === "`") {
+      inString = true;
+      stringChar = ch;
+      result += ch;
+      i++;
+      continue;
+    }
+
+    // å˜èªå¢ƒç•Œã®é–‹å§‹ã‹ã©ã†ã‹
+    if (/[A-Za-z_]/.test(ch)) {
+      let j = i;
+      let word = "";
+
+      while (j < len && /[A-Za-z0-9_]/.test(code[j])) {
+        word += code[j];
+        j++;
+      }
+
+      if (word === "False") {
+        result += "false";
+      } else if (word === "True") {
+        result += "true";
+      } else {
+        result += word;
+      }
+
+      i = j;
+      continue;
+    }
+
+    // ãã‚Œä»¥å¤–ã¯ãã®ã¾ã¾
+    result += ch;
+    i++;
+  }
+
+  return result;
+}
+
+function processFile(file) {
+  const full = path.resolve(file);
+  const code = fs.readFileSync(full, "utf8");
+  const fixed = fixContent(code);
+  if (fixed !== code) {
+    fs.writeFileSync(full, fixed, "utf8");
+    console.log("fixed:", file);
+    return true;
+  }
+  return false;
+}
+
+function main() {
+  const files = GLOBS.flatMap((pattern) => glob.sync(pattern, { nodir: true }));
+  console.log("target files:", files.length);
+  let count = 0;
+  for (const file of files) {
+    if (processFile(file)) count++;
+  }
+  console.log("modified files:", count);
+}
+
+main();
+
diff -ruN original/scripts/fix-css-fences.js fork/scripts/fix-css-fences.js
--- original/scripts/fix-css-fences.js	1970-01-01 00:00:00.000000000 +0000
+++ fork/scripts/fix-css-fences.js	2025-11-22 03:44:20.000000000 +0000
@@ -0,0 +1,57 @@
+// scripts/fix-css-fences.js
+// èª¤ã£ã¦æŒ¿å…¥ã•ã‚ŒãŸã€Œ```css ï½ ```ã€ã‚’ä¸€æ‹¬ä¿®æ­£ã™ã‚‹ã‚¹ã‚¯ãƒªãƒ—ãƒˆ
+//
+// å¯¾è±¡: components, pages, themes, lib é…ä¸‹ã® .js/.jsx/.ts/.tsx
+// ã‚„ã£ã¦ã„ã‚‹ã“ã¨:
+//  - "```css" ã‚’ "`" ã«
+//  - æ®‹ã£ãŸ "```" ã‚’ "`" ã«
+//
+// â€» ã‹ãªã‚Šæ©Ÿæ¢°çš„ãªç½®æ›ãªã®ã§ã€å®Ÿè¡Œå¾Œã¯ git diff ã§ç¢ºèªã—ã¦ãã ã•ã„ã€‚
+
+const fs = require("fs");
+const path = require("path");
+const glob = require("glob");
+
+const GLOBS = [
+  "components/**/*.{js,jsx,ts,tsx}",
+  "pages/**/*.{js,jsx,ts,tsx}",
+  "themes/**/*.{js,jsx,ts,tsx}",
+  "lib/**/*.{js,jsx,ts,tsx}",
+];
+
+function fixContent(code) {
+  let fixed = code;
+
+  // 1. ```css ã‚’ ` ã«
+  fixed = fixed.replace(/{````css/g, "{`");
+
+  // 2. æ®‹ã£ãŸ ``` ã‚’ ` ã«
+  fixed = fixed.replace(/````/g, "`");
+
+  return fixed;
+}
+
+function processFile(file) {
+  const full = path.resolve(file);
+  const code = fs.readFileSync(full, "utf8");
+  const fixed = fixContent(code);
+  if (fixed !== code) {
+    fs.writeFileSync(full, fixed, "utf8");
+    console.log("fixed:", file);
+    return true;
+  }
+  return false;
+}
+
+function main() {
+  const files = GLOBS.flatMap((pattern) => glob.sync(pattern, { nodir: true }));
+  console.log("target files:", files.length);
+  let count = 0;
+  for (const file of files) {
+    if (processFile(file)) count++;
+  }
+  console.log("modified files:", count);
+}
+
+main();
+
diff -ruN original/scripts/zh2ja.js fork/scripts/zh2ja.js
--- original/scripts/zh2ja.js	1970-01-01 00:00:00.000000000 +0000
+++ fork/scripts/zh2ja.js	2025-11-22 03:44:20.000000000 +0000
@@ -0,0 +1,223 @@
+require("dotenv").config();
+
+
+// scripts/zh2ja.js
+// ä¸­å›½èª -> æ—¥æœ¬èª è‡ªå‹•ç¿»è¨³ & ç½®æ›ã‚¹ã‚¯ãƒªãƒ—ãƒˆï¼ˆNotionNext ç”¨ï¼‰
+//
+// ä¾å­˜:
+//   npm i -D @babel/parser @babel/traverse @babel/generator glob
+//
+// ä½¿ã„æ–¹:
+//   OPENAI_API_KEY=... node scripts/zh2ja.js
+//   ï¼ˆ.env.local ã«æ›¸ã„ã¦ã„ã‚‹ãªã‚‰ dotenv ã‚’å™›ã¾ã›ã‚‹ã‹ã€ã‚·ã‚§ãƒ«ã§ export ã—ã¦ãã ã•ã„ï¼‰
+
+const fs = require("fs");
+const path = require("path");
+const glob = require("glob");
+const parser = require("@babel/parser");
+const traverse = require("@babel/traverse").default;
+const generator = require("@babel/generator").default;
+
+
+const OPENAI_API_KEY = process.env.OPENAI_API_KEY;
+if (!OPENAI_API_KEY) {
+  console.error("ERROR: OPENAI_API_KEY ãŒã‚»ãƒƒãƒˆã•ã‚Œã¦ã„ã¾ã›ã‚“ã€‚");
+  process.exit(1);
+}
+
+// Node18+ ãªã‚‰ fetch ã¯ã‚°ãƒ­ãƒ¼ãƒãƒ«ã«å­˜åœ¨ã—ã¾ã™
+if (typeof fetch !== "function") {
+  console.error("ERROR: Node.js 18 ä»¥ä¸Šã§å®Ÿè¡Œã—ã¦ãã ã•ã„ï¼ˆfetch ãŒå¿…è¦ã§ã™ï¼‰ã€‚");
+  process.exit(1);
+}
+
+// å¯¾è±¡ãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ã®ã‚°ãƒ­ãƒ–ãƒ‘ã‚¿ãƒ¼ãƒ³
+const GLOBS = [
+  "components/**/*.{js,jsx,ts,tsx}",
+  "pages/**/*.{js,jsx,ts,tsx}",
+  "themes/**/*.{js,jsx,ts,tsx}",
+  "lib/**/*.{js,jsx,ts,tsx}",
+  "docs/**/*.{js,jsx,ts,tsx,md,mdx}"
+];
+
+// ä¸­å›½èªã‚’å«ã‚€ã‹ã©ã†ã‹ã®ã–ã£ãã‚Šåˆ¤å®š
+const hasChinese = (text) => /[\u4E00-\u9FFF]/.test(text);
+
+// ã‚­ãƒ£ãƒƒã‚·ãƒ¥ãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«
+const CACHE_PATH = path.join(__dirname, "zh-ja-cache.json");
+let cache = {};
+if (fs.existsSync(CACHE_PATH)) {
+  try {
+    cache = JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync(CACHE_PATH, "utf8"));
+  } catch (e) {
+    console.warn("è­¦å‘Š: zh-ja-cache.json ã®èª­ã¿è¾¼ã¿ã«å¤±æ•—ã—ã¾ã—ãŸã€‚æ–°ã—ãä½œã‚ŠãªãŠã—ã¾ã™ã€‚");
+    cache = {};
+  }
+}
+
+function saveCache() {
+  fs.writeFileSync(CACHE_PATH, JSON.stringify(cache, null, 2), "utf8");
+}
+
+// å˜ä¸€æ–‡å­—åˆ—ã‚’ OpenAI ã§ç¿»è¨³
+async function translateOne(text) {
+  if (cache[text]) {
+    return cache[text];
+  }
+
+  console.log(` ç¿»è¨³ä¸­: "${text}"`);
+
+  const body = {
+    model: "gpt-4o-mini", // å¥½ããªãƒ¢ãƒ‡ãƒ«åã«å¤‰æ›´å¯
+    messages: [
+      {
+        role: "system",
+        content:
+          "You are a professional translator. Translate Chinese UI text into natural Japanese. " +
+          "Keep HTML tags, punctuation, and variables such as {name}, %s, ${...} unchanged. " +
+          "Return ONLY the Japanese text without explanations."
+      },
+      {
+        role: "user",
+        content: text
+      }
+    ]
+  };
+
+  const res = await fetch("https://api.openai.com/v1/chat/completions", {
+    method: "POST",
+    headers: {
+      "Authorization": `Bearer ${OPENAI_API_KEY}`,
+      "Content-Type": "application/json"
+    },
+    body: JSON.stringify(body)
+  });
+
+  if (!res.ok) {
+    const errText = await res.text();
+    console.error("OpenAI API ã‚¨ãƒ©ãƒ¼:", res.status, errText);
+    throw new Error("OpenAI API error");
+  }
+
+  const data = await res.json();
+  const ja = (data.choices?.[0]?.message?.content || "").trim();
+
+  if (!ja) {
+    throw new Error("ç¿»è¨³çµæœãŒç©ºã§ã™");
+  }
+
+  cache[text] = ja;
+  saveCache();
+  console.log(`  -> "${ja}"`);
+  return ja;
+}
+
+// è¤‡æ•°ãƒ†ã‚­ã‚¹ãƒˆã‚’é †æ¬¡ç¿»è¨³ï¼ˆé‡è¤‡æ’é™¤ï¼‰
+async function translateAll(texts) {
+  const result = {};
+  for (const t of texts) {
+    try {
+      const ja = await translateOne(t);
+      result[t] = ja;
+      // API åˆ¶é™ã«å¼•ã£ã‹ã‹ã‚‹å ´åˆã¯ã“ã“ã§å°‘ã—å¾…ã¤
+      await new Promise((r) => setTimeout(r, 200));
+    } catch (e) {
+      console.error("ç¿»è¨³å¤±æ•—:", t, e.message);
+    }
+  }
+  return result;
+}
+
+// ãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«1ã¤ã‚’å‡¦ç†
+async function processFile(filePath) {
+  const code = fs.readFileSync(filePath, "utf8");
+
+  const ast = parser.parse(code, {
+    sourceType: "module",
+    plugins: ["jsx", "typescript"]
+  });
+
+  const textsToTranslate = new Set();
+
+  // 1st pass: ä¸­å›½èªæ–‡å­—åˆ—ã‚’åé›†
+  traverse(ast, {
+    StringLiteral(pathNode) {
+      const value = pathNode.node.value;
+      if (hasChinese(value)) {
+        textsToTranslate.add(value);
+      }
+    },
+    TemplateLiteral(pathNode) {
+      pathNode.node.quasis.forEach((q) => {
+        const raw = q.value.cooked ?? q.value.raw;
+        if (hasChinese(raw)) {
+          textsToTranslate.add(raw);
+        }
+      });
+    }
+  });
+
+  if (textsToTranslate.size === 0) {
+    return false; // å¤‰æ›´ãªã—
+  }
+
+  console.log(`\n=== ${filePath} ===`);
+  const translateMap = await translateAll(textsToTranslate);
+
+  // 2nd pass: AST ã‚’æ›¸ãæ›ãˆ
+  let modified = false;
+  traverse(ast, {
+    StringLiteral(pathNode) {
+      const value = pathNode.node.value;
+      if (translateMap[value]) {
+        pathNode.node.value = translateMap[value];
+        modified = true;
+      }
+    },
+    TemplateLiteral(pathNode) {
+      pathNode.node.quasis.forEach((q) => {
+        const raw = q.value.cooked ?? q.value.raw;
+        if (translateMap[raw]) {
+          const ja = translateMap[raw];
+          q.value.raw = ja;
+          q.value.cooked = ja;
+          modified = true;
+        }
+      });
+    }
+  });
+
+  if (modified) {
+    const output = generator(ast, { retainLines: true }, code);
+    fs.writeFileSync(filePath, output.code, "utf8");
+    console.log(`=> ç½®æ›å®Œäº†: ${filePath}`);
+  }
+
+  return modified;
+}
+
+// ãƒ¡ã‚¤ãƒ³å‡¦ç†
+async function main() {
+  const files = GLOBS.flatMap((pattern) => glob.sync(pattern, { nodir: true }));
+  console.log("å¯¾è±¡ãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«æ•°:", files.length);
+
+  let changedCount = 0;
+  for (const file of files) {
+    const fullPath = path.resolve(file);
+    try {
+      const changed = await processFile(fullPath);
+      if (changed) changedCount++;
+    } catch (e) {
+      console.error("ãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«å‡¦ç†ä¸­ã«ã‚¨ãƒ©ãƒ¼:", fullPath, e.message);
+    }
+  }
+
+  console.log("\n=== å®Œäº† ===");
+  console.log("å¤‰æ›´å¤šæ•°ã®ãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«:", changedCount);
+}
+
+main().catch((e) => {
+  console.error("è‡´å‘½çš„ã‚¨ãƒ©ãƒ¼:", e);
+  process.exit(1);
+});
+
diff -ruN original/scripts/zh-ja-cache.json fork/scripts/zh-ja-cache.json
--- original/scripts/zh-ja-cache.json	1970-01-01 00:00:00.000000000 +0000
+++ fork/scripts/zh-ja-cache.json	2025-11-22 03:44:20.000000000 +0000
@@ -0,0 +1,561 @@
+{
+  "twikoo åŠ è½½å¤±è´¥": "twikooã®èª­ã¿è¾¼ã¿ã«å¤±æ•—ã—ã¾ã—ãŸ",
+  "é€‰é¡¹1": "ã‚ªãƒ—ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³1",
+  "é€‰é¡¹2": "ã‚ªãƒ—ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³2",
+  "ä»£ç æ¸²æŸ“": "ã‚³ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ãƒ¬ãƒ³ãƒ€ãƒªãƒ³ã‚°",
